thread.title: Flores scores in 82nd minute, Costa Rica ties Haiti 1-1
thread.title_full: Flores scores in 82nd minute, Costa Rica ties Haiti 1-1

title: Flores scores in 82nd minute, Costa Rica ties Haiti 1-1
text:
Dylan Flores scores in 82nd minute as Costa Rica ties Haiti 1-1 THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   9:26   9:26   
Organizations: 
Colorado (732) 

COMMERCE CITY, Colorado â€” Dylan Flores scored in the 82nd minute and Costa Rica tied Haiti 1-1 on Wednesday night in their Group B finale in the CONCACAF Olympic qualifying tournament. 
Costa Rica and Haiti both lost to Honduras and Mexico in the opening games in Carson, California. 
Flores lined a shot from just outside the penalty box that goaltender Luis Odelus had no chance of stopping. 
Pierre Paulson gave Haiti the lead in the 51st minute on a free kick from in close. He lined the ball into the left corner of the goal. 
Haiti had a chance to win in injury time on a corner kick, but couldn't knock in a loose ball in the box.
